resources.string: Create an account to join the home ‘%1$s‘, %2$s.
%1$s has invited you to join the home ‘%2$s‘, %3$s.
The invitation is no longer available.\n\nIf you want to join this home again, please request another invitation from one of the tado⁠° users.
By joining, you will lose access to your current home ‘%1$s‘.
By joining, you will be able to control tado⁠° devices in this home from the web and mobile app.
You are signed in as %1$s who already has access to this home. To accept the invitation sent to you, sign out and create your own account.
Sign in with your tado⁠° account to join the home ‘%1$s‘, %2$s.
The App for your Smart AC Control
tado⁠° makes sure energy is saved when you’re out and that it’s comfortable when you get home.
The App for your Smart Thermostat
Thank you for your interest in our beta program! You will receive an email with the status of your application after our review.
Email of your Google Play Store account
This email does not appear to be a valid email address.
Help us make the next releases of tado⁠° apps even better. Test new features and let us know what you think.

• As a beta tester you will receive unstable builds of the App that may cause your tado⁠° system to not work properly.

• By being a beta tester you commit to providing feedback and submitting bug reports for issues you've encountered.

• As the total number of users we can accept is limited, not everybody will be added to the beta program.
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Enter your heating system to check the compatibility.
Will tado⁠° work for your heating?
tado⁠° works perfectly with your heating system.

There are some rare cases with certain setups which simply do not work. We apologize for that. We are constantly developing new interfaces and are happy to inform you once tado⁠° is compatible with your heating system.
We are very sorry but tado⁠° does not work with your system.
This is the heating system you have chosen. Please double check and go back, if you need to change it.
Please give our customer support a call who will be happy to assist you with checking tado⁠°s compatibility with your heating system: +44 20 3893 2059
Unfortunately, our automatic check cannot determine the compatibility of your heating system.

Before you can install or try out tado⁠° you need to create your home.
If you want to join an existing home please ask the person who has bought or set up tado⁠° at your house to invite you. This can be sent to your email address in the settings of the web app.
The email is already in use with another user account.

Find out how much you can save.
Cut your costs by up to 31%
Find the right tado⁠° products for your home with our product finder.
The tado⁠° Smart AC Control makes your air conditioner smart to maximize your comfort.
This Extension Kit controls your heating.
The Bridge connects your tado⁠° devices with the Internet.
This Smart Thermostat controls your heating.
You can see the zone’s current temperature and change its target temperature on this Smart Thermostat.
This Smart Thermostat controls the heating for this zone.
This Temperature Sensor measures the current room temperature.
This Smart Radiator Thermostat controls the radiator on which it is mounted. You can see and change the zone’s target temperature on this device.
This Smart AC Control sends commands to your air conditioner via infrared. You can see the current room temperature and change the settings on this device.
Are you sure you want to remove this device from home %1$s?
Removing the last device from a zone will delete this zone. Do you want to remove this device from the home and delete the current zone?
Please assign the device to the zone where it is located.
This home has no devices installed yet.
A mode can only be deleted if it is not currently used in any time block.
No time block currently uses this mode.
The selected Mode is only active while somebody is at home. tado° switches to Away Mode automatically if nobody is at home.
The selected Mode remains active for the entire duration of the time block - regardless of whether or not somebody is at home.
An unfinished installation exists that is not compatible with the current version of the app. The installation has to be restarted
It seems that you are still connected to the Wi-Fi of your Smart AC Control. Please disconnect before you continue.

According to our records, the Smart Plan for this device has now been cancelled.

As per the Terms and Conditions, when the plan is cancelled you will lose the benefit of the Licence, but you will continue to have manual control of your heating system.

Where you wish to continue benefiting from the functionality offered by the Tado Smart Plan you can either reinstate payment or pay a one off fee giving us 28 days notice.

For further information please contact the HomeServe Smart Shop team on 0800 694 6111

According to our records, the rental fees for this device have not been paid.\n\nWhile there is an open balance your Smart Thermostat is switched to manual control and changes are only possible on the Smart Thermostat device itself.
Connecting to the server has failed. Please check your Internet connection.
This feature is not supported in the demo.
Sorry, something went wrong. The response from the server was unexpected. Please retry. If the problem persists please send us a screenshot of this error message.
Sorry, something went wrong. The response from the server was unexpected. Please retry. If the problem persists please send us a screenshot of this error message.
A new tado⁠° app version is waiting for you!
The feedback message can not be empty.
Tell us what’s on your mind…
Please let us know what’s bothering you.
A new tado° app version is waiting for you!\nPlease update your app.
Your heating costs today with tado⁠°
Your heating costs today without tado⁠°

Here you can see the current heating costs for today with and without tado⁠°. The bar shows 24 hours of a day and how long the different modes (Home and Away) were active. \n\nFor the calculation of the costs without tado⁠°, normal heating behaviour and lowered temperature at night are assumed.
Improve the heating cost calculation by providing the data of your last heating bill.
The billing period must be a minimum of 3 months.
Improve the heating cost calculation by providing the data of your last heating bill
Your heating costs today with tado°
Your heating costs today without tado°
Assign the accessory to a room, and edit the accessory and service names to be used with Siri.
With the help of this slider you can tell tado° whether to control your heating focused on savings or comfort. Just drag the button.
When the slider is set to Eco, tado° makes sure your home is not heated too early: when you get home it will take a few minutes until the home temperature is reached. That saves energy.
When the slider is set to Comfort, tado° ensures that the home temperature is reached before you arrive home. Of course, this requires more energy.
When the slider is set to Balance, tado° will find the best trade-off between comfort and savings for you.

Here you can see the current heating costs of today with and without tado°. The bar shows 24 hours of a day and how long the different modes (home, away and sleep) were active.\n\nFor the calculation of the costs without tado° normal heating behaviour and lowered temperature at night are assumed.
This home has no devices installed yet.
Smart Radiator Thermostats in the same zone are synchronized. If you change the temperature on one the others are notified.
Select the zone where the device is located.
To proceed with the installation please call our customer support. You can find the right number for your country in our Help Center.

You have successfully installed your tado⁠° Smart AC Control. Have fun using it!
Plug the USB cable on the back of the device and connect to power.
Your Smart AC Control is now connected to the server.
Make sure that your mobile is connected to the internet. It might not have reconnected to your home Wi-Fi.
Your Smart AC Control takes longer than expected to join your Wi-Fi and connect to the server.
Your Smart AC Control tries to join your Wi-Fi and to connect to the server. This can take up to 2 minutes.
If the display of your Smart AC Control shows the number %1$s restart the connection process.
In all other cases refer to our troubleshooting guide.
Searching for your Smart AC Control.
Set up the WiFi connection of your Smart AC Control to continue.
You are not connected to the Wi-Fi network of your Smart AC Control. Please connect to the Wi-Fi %1$s.
You are not connected to any Wi-Fi network. Please connect to the Wi-Fi %1$s of your Smart AC Control.
Connecting to your Smart AC Control has failed. Please retry.
No Wi-Fi Networks were found by your Smart AC Control.
Please enter the name of the Wi-Fi network.
Please enter the password for the Wi-Fi.
Please enter a password with at least 8 characters.
Please select the security of your Wi-Fi.
Do not restart the router or unplug the device while updating. The update can take up to 60 minutes.

tado⁠° unfortunately only works with air conditioners with a remote control that displays the current settings. \n\nReset your AC configuration or end the installation by removing the device from the home.
tado⁠° is not compatible with your air conditioner
These email addresses do not have the right format: %1$s
This email address does not have the right format.
Send an invitation to your fellow roommates to allow them control the AC, too.
Please select the positioning of your device.
The Smart AC control will continuously send command signals to the AC to make sure the position you choose works.
Find a place for the Smart AC Control
Please avoid placing the device directly in the air flow coming from the Air Conditioner.
Place the device in a location suitable for measuring the room temperature
Guide the cable out on the top. Adapt the cable length by storing the cable in the back.
Guide the cable out on the bottom. Adapt the cable length by storing the cable in the back. Use the adhesive strips for the wall mounting.
Enter the serial number and auth code - find them on the back of the device.
Please enter the device auth code.
This device is already registered to another home. If the serial number is correct, please contact our support: tado.com/support
The entered device serial number is not a tado⁠° Smart AC Control.
Please enter the device serial number.
Serial number and auth code do not match.
Do you also want to use Heat mode?
Enter your highest temperature in Heat mode
Enter your lowest temperature in Cool mode
tado⁠° recommends that you set the fan speed to low and swing to on.
Set your remote to “%1$s” and %2$s, and choose your preferred fan speed and swing settings (if available).
You need to teach the Smart AC Control some of your remote control’s commands.
The Smart AC Control maintains your target temperature by regulating the on/off state of the AC.\n\nLearn more
Please get your remote control to find out which functions your AC has.
Choose the modes your AC supports
You need to teach the commands of your remote control to the Smart AC Control.
We will go through the command signals one by one. Please answer for each if your AC is reacting to the on/off signals sent by the Smart AC Control.
tado⁠° will send several signals to your AC. Decide for each if the AC responds. This will take a few minutes.
Connecting to the server has failed. Please check your Internet connection.
Connecting to the server has failed. Please check your Internet connection.
The selected AC brand has no command signal sets.
For %1$s there are %2$s command signals in our database. Find out which one works with your AC.
For %1$s there is 1 command signal in our database. Find out if it works with your AC.
For the next steps, hold it like a remote control with the front or bottom side toward the AC.
Point the Smart AC Control towards the AC unit
%1$s\nis not the brand of your AC?\nSelect another brand.
The Smart AC Control might not have had visual contact to the AC: move it closer, point more accurately to the AC and try again.
Does %1$s mode have an “Auto” fan speed?
How many fan speeds are supported by your AC in this mode besides Auto?
How many fan speeds are supported by your AC in this mode?

Currently only 3 fan speeds (Low, Medium, High) and Auto are supported. Because you have more fan speeds, please choose the lowest for Low, a medium for Medium and the highest speed for High when you are asked to set a fan speed later in the process.
The temperature must be between 16°C and 31°C.
The temperature must be between 60°F and 89°F.
Set your AC to %1$s mode. Press the temperature up button until you reach the highest temperature.
The temperature must be between 15°C and %1$s°C.
The temperature must be between 59°F and %1$s°F.
Set your AC to %1$s mode. Press the temperature down button until you reach the lowest temperature.
Choose all possible options the %1$s mode has
If you end teaching now, you will only be able to use the modes already taught.
Choose the next mode to teach
In the next steps the Smart AC Control records command signals of your remote control. The distance should be max. 20 cm (8 inches).
Point your remote control at the Smart AC Control
Set the following settings on your remote
Sorry but something went wrong. We could not record a command signal. Do you want to retry the last recording or restart the whole run?
Your remote always sends all settings at a time. So you need to go through the possible combinations. But we will guide you.
Note: we do not support blowing direction and special modes like Eco right now.
Your AC will be controlled with this command set. Please make sure all commands work.
Teach command signals with the remote control.
Try and choose which of the %1$s possible command signal sets works best.
Point your Smart AC Control towards your AC for testing
Something must have gone wrong while recording.
All recordings for this mode will be deleted. Are you sure you want to reteach %1$s mode?
All recordings will be deleted. Are you sure you want to start over?
Test the commands you have just recorded
The setup for your AC is complete now!
Your Smart AC Control is downloading all command signals for your AC.
The download of the command signals for your AC failed. Please go to troubleshooting.
To register devices by scanning the QR Code, tado⁠° requires access to the camera. If you do not want to allow tado⁠° to access the camera, you can also enter the code manually.

Active until ended by a user.

Activate to turn on your AC when nobody is at home. When set to off, tado° will turn off the AC when nobody is at home.
Connecting to the server has failed. Please check your Internet connection.
To update your location, %1$s requires an Internet connection. We recommend turning on mobile data and WiFi.
To use location-based control, %1$s requires location services to be enabled.

%1$s informs you about low battery levels on your devices.
%1$s informs you about issues with the location-based control.
Without Premium you can view the Climate Report for the current day only.
Upgrade to Premium to review the climate information of your home at all times.
Take a look at weather, temperature, humidity and heating activity of recent days and months.
tado⁠° will automatically turn down your heating when the last person leaves home and begins to warm up again when it detects the first person returning.
The tado⁠° Smart Climate Assistant automatically turns off the heat when an open window is detected.
The tado⁠° Smart Climate Assistant adapts your heating to the weather forecast, making use of natural heat to save energy.
The tado⁠° Smart Climate Assistant adapts your heating to the weather forecast, making use of natural heat to save energy.
Would you like to switch to Away Mode?
Would you like to switch to Home Mode?
Would you like to turn off the heat to save more energy?
Would you like to turn off the heat to save more energy?
After an open window is detected, tado⁠° lets you choose to turn off the heat temporarily to save energy. It will remain off until the user-defined heat shut off time has elapsed.
Upgrade and let the tado⁠° Smart Climate Assistant automatically turn down the heat when the last person leaves home and turn it up again when it detects the first person returning.
Set a temperature for when the Away Mode is active.
Set different temperatures at home for different times in the Smart Schedule.
The tado⁠° Smart Climate Assistant will be deactivated for all of the users in your home.
An email will be sent to complete the payment process
- Premium features will be available to all users in your home\n- Renews automatically at the end of the term (1 month)
The tado⁠° Smart Climate Assistant has been activated for your account %1$s. All users in your home can now enjoy the tado⁠° Smart Climate Assistant.
Upgrade to let the tado⁠° Smart Climate Assistant automatically switch to Away Mode when nobody is home.
Upgrade to let the tado⁠° Smart Climate Assistant automatically switch to Home Mode when somebody is home.
Upgrade to let the tado⁠° Smart Climate Assistant end Manual Control automatically when the last person leaves, the first person returns or the next scheduled temperature becomes active.
Upgrade to Premium to let the tado⁠° Smart Climate Assistant automatically turn off the heat when an open window is detected.
Are you enjoying the tado⁠° app?
Wow! Would you like to rate our app?
tado⁠° Boiler Repair Services are the fastest and most convenient way for you to solve any issues concerning your heating at home.
Get a quote for a new boiler

If location-based control is turned on, tado⁠° includes this device in the presence detection. Only activate it on devices that you normally carry with you.

tado⁠° recognizes whether the residents are at home or away and acts accordingly.
Define the area where tado⁠° considers you at home.
Risk of being detected at home too early or for too long.
Risk of not being detected at home reliably.
Use Wi-Fi networks in your home area to improve location accuracy and reduce battery consumption.

When active, tado⁠° automatically recognizes and adds Wi-Fi networks you connect to in your home area to improve location accuracy and reduce battery consumption. When your device connects to one of your Home Wi-Fi networks, it is considered to be at home.
This Wi-Fi does not belong to your home?
Only activate on devices that you normally carry with you (eg. smartphone).

This will sign you out of the app. To continue controlling tado⁠° using this device, you will have to sign in again.
Invite people to join your home so that they can use tado⁠° as well. All people in the home can view, control and install tado⁠° devices through the tado⁠° app.

The basic commands of your AC’s remote control have been taught to the Smart AC Control.
This will update the command set on your Smart AC Control and may take up to a few minutes to be completed.
A command signal set defines the available features and how tado⁠° controls your AC. For each brand different sets might work. If some feature is missing or is not working, try another command set.
Failed to update command set. The Smart AC Control won’t be able to control your AC until the update is successful.
tado⁠° keeps the temperature within the defined range around your target temperature. The AC remains on or off for at least the specified minimum time. Learn more
tado⁠° keeps the temperature within the defined range around your target temperature. Learn more
The AC remains on or off for at least the specified minimum time. Learn more
The Smart AC Control sends a setting change to the AC, leaving the room temperature regulation up to the AC.\n\nLearn more
This will delete the AC configuration and restart the AC setup process.
This will delete your current commands and restart the AC setup process.
By switching you may lose part of your Smart Schedule settings.
By switching you may lose part of your Smart Schedule settings.
In this mode of operation, the Smart AC Control maintains your target temperature by regulating the on/off state of the AC.
The Smart AC Control maintains your target temperature by regulating the on/off state of the AC.\n\nLearn more
The temperature measuring device shows an animation when settings are changed via manual control.
Assignment to new zone by user not possible yet. To reassign the device to a new zone, please contact our Technical Support. You can find the number for your country in our Help Center.
Assigning the last device of a zone to another zone will delete the current zone. Do you want to assign this device to another zone and delete the current zone?
When the batteries in your Smart Thermostat run out, you can replace them with three fresh AAA alkaline batteries (LR03). Learn more
When the batteries in your Smart Radiator Thermostat run out, you can replace them with two fresh AA alkaline batteries (LR6). Learn more
This Smart AC Control connects to your air conditioner via infrared. You can see the current room temperature and change the settings on the device.

This Smart Thermostat controls your heating for this zone. You can see the zone’s current temperature and change its target temperature on the device.
You can see the zone’s current temperature and change its target temperature on this Smart Thermostat.

This Smart Thermostat controls your hot water. You can see and change your hot water settings on the device.

Removing the last device from a zone will delete this zone. Do you want to remove this device from the home and delete the current zone?
Choose which device should measure temperature and humidity of this zone. Learn more
It may take up to 40 minutes for the changes to become active.
It may take some minutes for the changes to become active.
Depending on where the device sits, the measured temperature might be different from the actual temperature in the middle of the room. Here you can correct the temperature measured.
After an open window is detected, the heating will be turned off to save energy. It will remain off until the user-defined heat shutoff time has elapsed.
Changing settings on the tado⁠° device starts Manual Control. Choose how long it should stay active.
Any setting change set on the tado⁠° device will remain active until a user ends Manual Control.
Any setting change on the tado⁠° device will remain active until the next time block in the Smart Schedule, or until residents leave or arrive.
Any setting change set on the tado⁠° device will remain active for the selected time span.\n\nIf you apply any more changes during this time the timer is not restarted.
The credentials you have entered are incorrect. Please try again.
The password you have entered is incorrect. Please try again.
Email does not exist. Please try again.
Your email or password is incorrect.
Please confirm that from now on you want to use this name for this device.
Choose a name for this device
Forgot your password? Please enter your email address to request a reset link.

For more comfort and higher energy savings please activate Location-based Control and allow tado⁠° to use your location in the next step.\n\nPlease make sure that you use the recommended phone settings.
Location-based Control helps to reduce your energy costs and increases the comfort at home! It requires access to your location.

The Location-based Control feature requires access to your location, which you need to enable in the operating system settings.\n\nIf you don\'t want tado⁠° to access your location, please tap “Deactivate” to disable the feature for this device.

You have activated the Location-based Control feature, which requires access to your location. Allow tado⁠° to use your location in the next step.\n\nIf you don\'t want tado⁠° to access your location, please tap “Deactivate” to disable the feature for this device.

You have activated the Location-based Control feature. This requires access to your location, but restrictions on this device prevent tado⁠° from using it.\n\nLocation-based Control needs to be disabled.
The Location-based Control feature works best when background app refresh is enabled in the system settings.
The Location-based Control feature works best when background app refresh is enabled, but restrictions on this device prevent tado⁠° from using it.

The Location-based Control feature requires access to your location, which you need to enable in the operating system settings.\n\nIf you don\'t want tado⁠° to access your location, please tap “Deactivate” to disable the feature for this device.

For the Location-based Control feature to function properly, tado⁠° must always have access to your location. The current operating system settings are too restrictive. Please ensure the permissions are correctly set to always allow the tado⁠° app access to your location.\n\nIf you don\'t want tado⁠° to access your location, please tap “Deactivate” to disable the feature for this device.
When the slider is set to Balance, tado⁠° will find the best trade-off between comfort and savings for you.
When the slider is set to Comfort, tado⁠° ensures that the home temperature is reached before you arrive home. Of course, this requires more energy.
When the slider is set to Eco, tado⁠° makes sure your home is not heated too early: When you get home it will take a few minutes until the home temperature is reached. That saves energy.
Set a specific temperature. If enabled, automatic adjusting is turned off.
tado⁠° preheats your home before your arrival. As you near home, the target temperature will increase.\n\nWhen set to Balance, tado⁠° will find the best trade-off between comfort and savings for you.

tado⁠° preheats your home before your arrival. As you near home, the target temperature will increase.\n\nWhen set to Comfort, tado⁠° ensures that your desired home temperature is reached shortly before your arrival.

tado⁠° preheats your home before your arrival. As you near home, the target temperature will increase.\n\nWhen set to Eco, tado⁠° makes sure your home is not preheated too early and your desired home temperature is only reached after your arrival.
When nobody is at home, tado⁠° ensures that the home stays at least at this temperature.
When set to Off, tado⁠° only starts heating after your arrival.
As soon as the last person has left home the Away Settings become active.
The settings of this block are used, even if nobody is at home.
The settings are only active while somebody is at home. If nobody is at home, tado⁠° will use the Away setting.
Mon, Tue, Wed, Thu, Fri, Sat, Sun
If enabled, tado⁠° starts heating early and increases the target temperature to reach the scheduled temperatures on time.
When Early Start is deactivated, tado⁠° only starts heating at the scheduled time.
When Early Start is activated tado⁠° ensures that the desired temperature is already reached at the start of a schedule block.
It seems that you are still connected to the Wi-Fi of your Smart AC Control. Please disconnect before you continue.
Could not record. Please retry with the following setting.
The billing period must be a minimum of 3 months.
If the display of your Smart AC Control shows a four digit number restart the connection process.
Overlay the AC on-time, the humidity and the sun impact using the buttons on the right.
Zoom into the exact values by long pressing the report curve.
Overlay the heat request, the humidity and the sun impact using the buttons.
Zoom into the exact values by long pressing the report curve.
The Away Mode automatically becomes active when everybody has left the house. Set a temperature or let tado⁠° calculate the most efficient temperature.
Set the temperatures for when you are at home. Since the schedule is smart, the settings only become active when somebody is at home.
When Early Start is activated tado⁠° ensures that the desired temperature is already reached at the start of a schedule block. You can deactivate Early Start in the Smart Schedule’s settings.
